articles.title: The Emmy nominations are out Tuesday, but who should really get a nod? - USA TODAY
articles.description: Plenty of great TV shows and actors will be nominated at the 2021 Emmys. But plenty will be left out. Here's who we think really deserves it
articles.content:
It's an honor to be nominated, but sometimes the right people don't get that honor.
